passive_1: Upon taking lethal damage, resurrects and restores 50% of base health and 100% of maximum mana after 4 seconds of  stasis (300 second cooldown).

motd: Bugfix: Fixed a bug where certain summoner spells could be used while in the resurrecting state.

passive_1: Upon taking lethal damage, resurrects and restores 50% of base health and 30% of maximum mana after 4 seconds of  stasis (300 second cooldown).

motd: Bugfix: Abilities with damaging auras (e.g. Renekton's Dominus) no longer continue to damage nearby enemies while the champion is in a revive state.

passive_1: Upon taking lethal damage, restores 50% base health and 30% maximum mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300 second cooldown).
Upon taking lethal damage, restores the higher of 700 health or 30% of maximum health, and 30% maximum mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300 second cooldown).
Upon taking lethal damage, restores 30% of base health and maximum mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300 second cooldown).

motd: Change: Most positive buffs are now removed on pseudo-death.

passive_1: Upon taking lethal damage, restores 750 health and 375 mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300 second cooldown).

motd: Change: Will now only be ready on cloned units if it was ready on the creating champion.
Change: Positive buffs are no longer lost on pseudo-death.
Change: Elixirs are no longer lost on pseudo-death.

passive_1: Upon taking lethal damage, restores 40% of base health and maximum mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300 second cooldown).
motd: Change: You can no longer teleport while being revived by Guardian Angel.

passive_1: Upon taking lethal damage, restores 50% of base health and maximum mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300 second cooldown).
